title: Ep 211: Okay, But is Squirt Really Pee? (Ft. Lola Jean the Squirt Queen)
itunes:title: Ep 211: Okay, But is Squirt Really Pee? (Ft. Lola Jean the Squirt Queen)
description:
This week the duo is joined by Lola Jean the Squirting Queen. That’s right! This week we are getting down to the myths and act of squirting with a woman who currently holds the world record for most squirt volume! We dig into how to dirty talk without being gender specific and nipple orgasms as well. Somehow we even dive into the things that may be found under a hoe’s bed frame and give MMF threesome tips that can be applied to group sex period! Lola shares a very important tip everyone should consider before having a threesome. 


Follow this week’s guest 

Instagram @lolajeandotcom
